articles.title: 1 woman's story of rape convinced all Weinstein trial jurors - The Associated Press
articles.description: LOS ANGELES (AP) — Most of the jurors at Harvey Weinstein's Los Angeles trial  were ready to convict him of crimes related to three of the four women  he was charged with raping or sexually assaulting.
articles.content:
